Royal Kona Resort Overlooking Kailua Bay in the heart of Kona town, this oceanfront resort features some of the island's best sunset viewing areas. Spacious guest rooms offer breath-taking mountain or ocean views. Lie back and relax in the private sandy sunning area around the pool or head over to the swimming lagoon which is a great spot for some snorkelling. Enjoy the fun of the swimming pool and savour locally inspired cuisine overlooking the tropical ocean sunset.
